{"id":757279082,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1658845863,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/757279082/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int left =0;\n        int right = 0 ;\n        map <char ,int> m;\n        int ans =0;\n        if(s.size() == 0)\n            return 1;\n        while(right < s.size()){\n            char ch = s[right];\n            if(m.count(ch)>0){\n                left = max(left ,m[ch]);\n            }\n            ans = max(ans ,right-left);\n            m[ch] =right ;\n            right++;\n        }\n        return ans ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
